name: Verify Projector Video Does Not Loop
description: Validates that the introduction video plays once and remains on the final frame without looping.
testObjective: Ensure video playback behavior is correct and displays proper end message.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Intro video is playing on projector

testData.finalMessage: Galactic Fruit thanks you for your sacrifice.

steps.action: Observe the intro video playing on the projector wall
steps.expected: Video plays smoothly through the projector

steps.action: Wait for the video to complete
steps.expected: Video completes and displays final frame with message: 'Galactic Fruit thanks you for your sacrifice.'

steps.action: Continue waiting to observe looping behavior
steps.expected: Video does NOT loop and remains on final frame

steps.action: Attempt to interact with the projector
steps.expected: No interaction occurs (projector is not interactable)
